description:
**This course is updated for 2016, and is guaranteed to give you results once implemented**

Being able to drive targeted traffic to their website on demand is every internet marketer's dream. Traffic is the difference between an amazing website that no one knows about and a crappy blog that keeps getting action.

Most people are clueless when it comes to paid advertising. They go out there and buy placements, lose it all then go home. Basically a trip to the casino.

What if I told you there was a little known -for now- hack that you could use to create trueview videos (these videos you can skip after five seconds), and get FREE targeted traffic to your website, product, or affiliate offer ?

Good news - This is the truth!

This course provides the blueprint to creating, uploading and managing ads that will run for you 24/7, on a platform that gets over 4 BILLION views a day. Yes, you heard that right.

All of the tactics, scripts, and techniques are the product of my personal experience with this platform, my research, my discoveries and my advice. I went through months of testing so you won't have to.

*Sitting on unlimited targeted traffic is a powerful place to be.

Skeptical?

We have taught over 12,000 students the ropes of internet marketing, ranging from flipping public domain content to creating compelling promotional videos. This is our passion.

A few of the things you'll learn in this course:

  1. How to quickly create an amazing video using my successful template
  2. How to create video ads using only free tools with three different styles
  3. How to find profitable affiliate offers to promote (if you want to do so).
  4. The exact strategy that keeps your bidding costs ridiculously low.
  5. My blueprint to find instantly profitable placements.
  6. How to increase your Click Through Rate to 10%
  7. How to scale your campaigns to crazy heights.

Trust me, this is just a small sample of what you'll learn and by the end of this course you'll have the ingredients to turning Youtube into your own playground.

I will personally respond to any questions you may have as you go through the material, inside the member's area.

Sounds good ? Enroll now and let's get started already !

To your success,

Howard Lynch
title: Youtube Ads Genius - Paying For Engagement, Not Just Clicks
